narrative:
No noncompliance identified this inspection. 
This facility meets the requirements for obtaining a class "C" exhibitors license. 
The pre-licensing process including fees paid must be completed within 90 days of today's date or the process will be 
canceled and the application fee forfeit. 
Exit briefing conducted with the Owner. 
 
The license fee may be sent to the following address: 
USDA-APHIS Animal Care Building B, Mailstop #3W11 
2150 Centre Avenue 
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117 
 
Phone number: (970) 494-7478 
Fax: (970) 494-7461 
Email: animalcare@usda.gov

End
